entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:34 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 2:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -43.1°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
